languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор нашел вернейшую союзницу в лице Инцендии Чорда. Она с радостью стала смертоносным инструментом воздаяния в руках господина ван Калокса, и инструмент этот не знал отдыха.
The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор нашел вернейшую союзницу в лице Инцендии Чорда. Она с радостью стала смертоносным инструментом воздаяния в руках господина ван Калокса, и инструмент этот не знал отдыха.

traits.locale_text: Lord Inquisitor found the most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, and this instrument knew no rest.
Lord Inquisitor found the most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, and this instrument knew no rest.
The Lord Inquisitor found the most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

languages.text: 审判官找到了一位极为忠诚的盟友——因森蒂娅·库尔达。她很高兴能成为冯·卡洛克斯审判官手中不眠不休的工具，为他带来致命的清算。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: 审判官找到了自己最忠实的盟友——因森蒂娅·库尔达。她很高兴能成为冯·卡洛克斯审判官手中不眠不休的工具，为他带来致命的清算。

languages.text: Der Großinquisitor fand in Incendia Chorda die treueste aller Verbündeten. Sie wurde in van Calox' Händen bereitwillig zu einem tödlichen Instrument der Vergeltung und kannte keine Rast.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: Der Großinquisitor fand in Incendia Chorda die treueste aller Verbündeten. Sie wurde in van Calox' Händen bereitwillig zu einem tödlichen Instrument der Vergeltung und kannte keine Rast.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur trouva en Incendia Chorda une alliée extrêmement loyale. Elle devint volontiers un instrument mortel et infatigable de châtiment entre les mains de van Calox.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur trouva en Incendia Chorda son alliée la plus loyale. Elle devint volontiers un instrument mortel et infatigable de châtiment entre les mains de van Calox.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor encontró en Incendia Chorda a una aliada extremadamente leal. Se deleitó en ser portadora de la justicia letal de van Calox, una función que desempeñaba sin descanso.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor encontró en Incendia Chorda a su aliada más leal. Se deleitó en ser portadora de la justicia letal de van Calox, una función que desempeñaba sin descanso.

languages.text: ロード・インクィジターはインセンディア・チョーダという最も忠実な同盟者を見つけた。彼女は喜んでヴァン・カロックスの手による休むことを知らぬ報復の凶器となった。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジターはインセンディア・チョーダという最も忠実な同盟者を見つけた。彼女は喜んでヴァン・カロックスの手による休むことを知らぬ報復の凶器となった。

languages.text: İncendia Chorda, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sadık bir müttefiki oldu. Van Calox'un ellerinde ölümcül bir savaş gerecine dönüştü ve bu görevini yorulmak nedir bilmeden, memnuniyetle yerine getirdi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor found a most loyal ally in Incendia Chorda. She gladly became a lethal instrument of retribution in van Calox's hands, knowing no rest.

traits.locale_text: İncendia Chorda, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sadık bir müttefiki hâline geldi. Van Calox'un ellerinde ölümcül bir savaş gerecine dönüştü ve bu görevini yorulmak nedir bilmeden, memnuniyetle yerine getirdi.
